title: Unplanned incident - impact on lanes and roads

testSteps.description: Given I am at the LiveTraffic Website
Then I should see the LiveTraffic Website Home page
When I choose Hide map options

Then user should see lanes impacted information for "Unplanned" Incident
| Scheduled_Roadwork_Day_Time | Scheduled_Roadwork_Direction |
| Sunday (9:00pm to 4:00am) | Westbound closed |
| Monday (9:00pm to 4:00am) | Westbound closed |
| Tuesday (9:00pm to 4:00am) | Westbound closed |
| Wednesday (9:00pm to 4:00am) | Westbound closed |
| Thursday (9:00pm to 4:00am) | Westbound closed |
